title: App Store antitrust case is ‘firing on all cylinders’
description:
Jonathan Kanter, the head of the Department of Justice’s antitrust unit, is intensifying the case against Apple over its App Store policies. According to the Financial Times, Kanter – who assumed the role in November 2021 – has stated that the investigation is now “firing on all cylinders.” For years, regulators, businesses, and enforcers have... Read more »

The post App Store antitrust case is ‘firing on all cylinders’ appeared first on Developer Tech News.
